response.overview: In order to save their Grandmother's castle, Finley and her twin brother, Shannon, craft an immersive VR experience within the walls of the ancestral castle. However, when an unexpected power surge glitches the game, opening a supernatural portal, the twins (along with the oddball castle staff) must reunite a debonair 18th-century ghost with his star-crossed lover... ...or be trapped in his game forever.
response.title: GLITCHED
